casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Nell Monette BALDWIN No. 69P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 13, 2018 Monette Baldwin, for Baldwin, Monette. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 8th of March 2018 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of March 2018."

Beasley, and Morgan, J. recused
